No need to apologize, I wasn't picking a fight just trying to head off a ru=
mor mill before it started. Not necassarily from your response Rick, but yo=
u know how these posts feed off one another and build. No worries! ;)
=A0
R=
egards,

Frank R.

--- On Fri, 5/15/09, Rick <rasterer@...> wrote:=

To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, May 15, 2009, 1:56 =
PM









I'm sorry if I hit some kind of nerve, but it was really just a=
 simple question, and I'm sure you can understand why the rumor would arous=
e curiosity. There's no need to head anything off on my account, and as you=
 said, he can speak for himself if he likes. Though, because of the tone of=
 your response, I hope he does address it now, to clear up any ideas which =
your reaction might have engendered.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, Fran=
k Ratka <warrior18eii@ ...> wrote:
>
> Look guys don't read anything into i=
t. Frank and Chris have had a "on again, off again" relationship as long as=
 they have known each other. I normally don't speak up for Sumption, he is =
quite capable of speaking for himself but I thought I would head this off b=
efore imaginations got away from you all. 
> =A0
> If he wants you to know =
his business he will let you know. I feel you overstep your bounds to expec=
t an explanation.
> =A0
> Regards,
> =A0
> Frank R.
